text: The World Tamil Badminton Federation (WTBF) (Tamil: அகில உலக தமிழர் பூப்பந்தாட்ட பேரவை) is the international governing body of Badminton for the world Tamils. It conducts the annual international competition. The first ever tournament was held on 2013 in Switzerland. ==Tournament Winners== ===Men's Singles Open=== Year Host(s) Final venue Crowd Result Result Result Result Result First Second Third Fourth
